Summary: Came down fast. Stopped now. Flew off in arch
trends: There has been one other sighting in East Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in East Los Angeles on or around May 9th 1952
divs: Sighting DetailsMy mother called me in because it was getting dark. Something caught my eye. I looked up and this spacecraft came in so fast it left a trail. It stopped immediately. I watched it for maybe 30 seconds, then it took off so fast it left another trail. It left in an arch. I have never called it a UFO, it was definitely a Spacecraft. There were lights on the craft, but I do not remember what color they were.
